scripts.generate-license-report:
echo 'Frontend Dependencies:
=====================
' > LICENSE_REPORT.txt && cd fbi-agent-game-frontend && npx license-checker --summary >> ../LICENSE_REPORT.txt && echo '
Backend Dependencies:
====================
' >> ../LICENSE_REPORT.txt && cd ../fbi-agent-game-backend && npx license-checker --summary >> ../LICENSE_REPORT.txt
